messages.Earthenworks.Translation Tool.Title: Localization Tool
Object does not have a translator installed.
messages.Earthenworks.Translation Tool.Bind Field: Label and drive string fields in the object
Pick a slot to localize and install a translator to begin binding fields to be translated.
Drag and drop a string field from an inspector onto the link icon to drive it.
The label must be a valid un-namespaced dynamic variable name (avoid symbols)
Another field already uses that label
Field bound! Preparing to bind another...

Type label identifying a field to localize here.
Ex: Object Name.Main Menu.Title
messages.Earthenworks.Translation Tool.Export.Ins:
Send the entire document to translators.
Double-click to select the entire document.
messages.Earthenworks.Translation Tool.Import.Ins:
Paste the entire document
Malformed documents are ignored.
messages.Earthenworks.Translation Tool.Help.Title: Instructions
messages.Earthenworks.Translation Tool.Help.Body: Open an inspector of the root of the object to be localized. Drop the root slot into the tool and install a translator if needed. Verify the default object locale matches the original language of the object. Label and drive every field to be localized. Use Show Driven Fields to find missed fields. To modify a driven field update the dynamic variable with the same label in: Object Root Translator Translation Tables Locale to update
